tool_description: Revokes roles from users across systems with cleanup and validation of dependent permissions.

user_identifier.description: User to revoke the role from

immediate_revocation.description: Revoke immediately or at next scheduled time

cleanup_dependent.description: Remove dependent permissions and group memberships

preserve_data_access.description: Maintain read access to previously accessible data

notify_user.description: Send notification to user about role revocation

error_messages: User not found: The specified user identifier does not exist in the target system.
Role not assigned: The specified role is not currently assigned to this user.
Revocation blocked: Role cannot be revoked due to system constraints or dependencies.
Permission denied: Insufficient privileges to revoke this role.
System unavailable: Target system is not accessible for role revocation.
Cleanup failed: Role revoked but dependent permission cleanup encountered errors.
usage: Provide user_identifier, role_id, system_name, and revocation_reason. Control timing with immediate_revocation and specify cleanup behavior with cleanup_dependent and preserve_data_access flags.

revocation_id.description: Unique identifier for the role revocation

permissions_removed.description: List of permissions that were removed

retained_access.description: Access rights that were preserved if requested
